string.text: Change the music! It's annoying...
Pay five Rubles then I will change it...
Are you serious? Well here you are Mr D.J.....
Pay for listening to this crap? No way!
If I didn't charge for changing music these guys would be asking all the time!
Put on Retro anything...
Rock-n-roll ?
I will leave it to Fate...
Something more modern...
I also prefer retro...
OK, but don't expect to hear Elvis...
I'll drink to that!...
OK let's see what I have...
Can't make up your mind, can you?...
Hello Stalker...
Well..., can we talk?
One of your men has told me it is possible to make a deal with you...

I have been informed you helped one of my men, Mongol. For that, I give my sincere thanks. I will put out the word about you and no Bandit in this valley will be your enemy. If you want to do some trading talk to Core just outside my office.
I've been told that you posses a key to the underground laboratory...

So, you want the key! What's there for you? In that place is nothing but monsters, nothing valuable remains. Yes I've got a key but you don't really think I'm just going to hand it over for free? You've got to earn it!
I was expecting this, nothing in the zone comes easy!

If you've got the balls I've got a task for you. Here recently a helicopter has crashed, nearby - to the east of the bog... Why, I do not know, it came from the Zone center. I have sent some of my morons to check what was there, but nearby is a den of chimeras so they were too afraid to go any closer. Saw just a pair of corpses near a helicopter and a artefact case nearby. So you want to try your luck? Rummage around there and bring me all the loot and you can have this key.
Chimeras! I knew this wouldn't be easy. I will go check it out.
Well let your men go, I'm not risking my ass!.
I found the helicopter and the Chimera were as playful as always
I sent my morons to track you but I have not received their report yet... What was there? In the helicopter?
There was nothing... just a pair of corpses, scientists, that's all...
I found a container which I have not risked to open, and some documents that's it...
Nothing you say? And after all you made a deal with me. My men saw as you carrying a container...
Blinn, has lost...
Well it is pleasant to deal with you, give the container and documents....
Here's your loot, now where's my key?
Ha, Borov keeps his word! Here's your key. I've got some other business for you if your interested.
That sounds good, when Im ready I will let you know...
And your men saw nothing? Probably too drunk to see their hand in front of their face!
This is not necessary there's been too much drinking, once again we will try to work together... Can we turn to one more order of business?
What is it you want?

One of my men, Rat has gone missing along with my PDA. Coincidence! I think not!. There was data on that PDA with our internal secrets. Now to business, find this rat and take away the PDA. How you do it is up to you, just bring me the PDA and we will talk about your reward.
This is a huge zone, where should I start looking?
Last time he was spotted on the Cordon... Well, do we have an agreement?
Yes, I Will try to find your Rat...
No way!, these are your problems not mine!.
Hello Borov, I have found Rat...
Well done. Where's the PDA?
And where's my reward?
There will be tour reward if you have the goods.
Sounds good to me, I believe this is your PDA...

Great!, here's the key to the underground lab and the location of one cache. Also the supply room is open to you, there might be something you need. The cache is located in the north of Army Warehouses, near the fallen helicopter.
Great!, here's the location of one cache. It's located in the north of Army Warehouses, near the fallen helicopter. Check the supply room, it should be open to you now.
Well all is fine, you keep your word.
Hey, stalker! Approach, we will talk...
Are you Rat?
Krysjuk! My surname is Krysjuk!
OK! OK! calm down, so Rat is not your real name, there is business I have with you...
What business could I possibly have with you? I havn't had any dealings with you before?
What about Borov? He wants your head. You've got his PDA.
Yes I took it, it has co-ordinates of several places Borov keeps his caches, I can share this information with you if you help me out.
And if I put a bullet in the back of your neck, this will not help?
What kind of help are we talking about?
Kill me but it will not help you find the PDA. Its in a secret place.
I'm really scared for my life. If you can get the Barman to agree to let me pass through there, Borov wont be able to find me.
I Will talk to the Barman, but I promise nothing...
Yes you have gone! Have got! Go there, go here....
It is good, I have joked - you have laughed... What commission you have.?
Ah you young reptile! You will tell me everything!
I Spoke with the Barman. He will let you pass, but only if you give up some valuable loot.
I will show you where, but who will go and collect it?
I will get it! Also I will carry it to the Barman.
OK, write down the cache co-ordinates in the Dark valley. Three Moonlight and a Mother's beads there lie. Carry all to the Barman if I can reach the Bar I will tell you where the PDA is.
Hello Barman! There is a request from one bandit.
You dealing with gangsters, I did not see this coming.
Your quite the joker, however. This Rat wants to hide from Borov. You will help him?
And what's in it for me? If he wants safety - let him pay. Tell him I want the loot from a cache. Bring me all of what's useful then I will allow him safe passage.
OK, I will tell him your terms.
Greetings to you Marked One, the sacred saviour of stray souls!
I'm not in the mood, what is necessary?
Krysjuk has given up a cache, I visited there and found three Moonlight and a Mother's beads.
That's enough to buy him safe passage. Give here and tell him we have a deal. I will tell the block posts to let him pass.
Give? why not keep for myself and leave?
OK, take away.
OK, I will look for this.. 'Rat'...
Ha Ha, Leave if you want and go hump dogs...
Barman agrees to accept you. Now are you happy?
I'm looking forward to a quieter life...
And what about my share?
Your share waits for you in Agroprom... Here is a way to make a Medusa from different stuff... In an Electra it is necessary to throw a head of a Jerboa, bandage, sausage and a can of food...
OK, I will go look... If you've lied I will tear out your soul.
Wolf
Nimble
Fox
Guide
Jurik
Bes
Mole
Krysjuk "The Rat"
Krysjuk "The Rat"
Greetings man of science! What business are you offering?
And to you greetings also Marked One. Here I modify PDAs to detect mutants..
This is Necessary business! And how does this work?

Each mutants emits a different energy signal. But it is necessary to acquire a certain amount of DNA to calibrate the detector program. If I had the parts of rare monsters I could go ahead with this work.
Which monsters can you detect?
I Suspect the most dangerous: the Bloodsucker, the Pseudo-giant, and the Controller. Which one are you interested in detecting?
Make the detector for bloodsuckers, they are really fast!
Pseudo-giants are better for bypassing, it is necessary to know where they are!
The Most dangerous Mutant in the ZONE would have to be a Controller!!
To me in general all the same, I and so with them I will consult...
For proper adjustment I need feelers of the bloodsucker, 2 feelers And 20 Military PDAs
For proper adjustment of detecting the pseudo-giant, 2 hands and 15 Military PDAs
For proper adjustment of detecting controllers its necessary to collect 2 hands and 30 Military PDAs.
I Will find the feelers and PDAs, this upgrade will really make my life easier!
These giants I often come across, I will bring their hands and the PDAs.
I will find the controller hands and bring the PDAs! The controllers will be dead meat!
When there will be concrete results, then will talk.

For alteration of a PDA into a detector which reacts to bloodsuckers, it is necessary to extract 2 feelers of these bloodsuckers and to collect 20 Military PDAs. To bring all it is to the Senior lecturer and he will alter my PDA.

For alteration of a PDA into a detector which reacts to pseudo-giants, it is necessary to extract 2 parts of a body from different Pseudo-giants and to collect 15 Military PDAs. To bring all it is to the Senior lecturer and it will alter my PDA.

\nFor alteration usual PDA in the detector which reacts on controllers, it is necessary to extract 2 parts of a body of the controller and to collect 30 Military PDAs. To bring all it to the Senior lecturer and he will alter my PDA.
I Welcome, the master!
It is good to see you!
I Have collected the necessary items for the detector on the bloodsucker. Here they are.
This is excellent, now it is possible to make the modification. Here, now your PDA is adjusted to detect bloodsuckers within 30 to 40 meters.
Thanks! this great.
Senior lecturer, the requirements are not present!
Yes in this cellar what health...
I have collected PDAs and the parts of the giant. Here take away...
Well the mechanism is ready, take the PDA adjusted for pseudo-giants. Now it is possible to find them in advance.
Well my friend. Thanks from me is due!
Hows life, Senior lecturer?
In general, in comparison with Sementsky - it is quite good...
Yes! I have brought the parts for the detector.
Well now the controllers cant hide! Detection radius of 50 meters!
Have a Bottle on me...
Senior lecturer, I need some help finding someone.

Basically we can trace all un-coded personal PDA, and I could produce a mark defined on your PDA map. Bring any five Military PDAs and for a small fee I will find the location of the necessary person.
Give we will be adjust...
I agree, I will collect PDAs and return...
Agreed! And whom do you want to find?
And who is concrete?
It is ready! Now on your PDA have is a mark!
I Respect!
The Acquaintance of one from the Cordon...
On a Garbage there was one person...
In the Dark Valley saw it...
a S.T.A.L.K.E.R. by the name of Fox.
There was there a fellow - Nimble.
Wolf I want to find.
Blinn! I have no idea where he could be...
For Jurika I search, business I have with him.
It is necessary to find Bes.
A conversation with Mole is necessary.
This Bandit, Krysjuk "The Rat". I need to find him...
Guide I want to find.
Artyom of the Culinary specialist where to find?
Hi,it is necessary to see the repairman.
It is simple so I will not pass...
Instead of it is simple so? What you want?
How about you give me some anti-rad and I will let you pass, Have we an agreement?
Nice try, I do not use them. I prefer vodka. Now step aside
Do not have any anti-rad...
How about a first-aid kit, military?
Its simple, will you accept?
Yes, here you are.
On me is a scientific first-aid kit, it is much better!
I don't have any first-aid sets...
Simple? Give two then you will pass.
Garik you redneck? Take.
Its a small world Garick, again we will meet.
Have agreed! Pass!
I need some supplies...
I can trade certain supplies in exchange for Artefacts .. What exactly do you need?
Ammunition, Grenades...
I need a decent Weapon...
Medical Supplies...
Field Repair Kits...

I can offer the following:

1. 12x70 buck for a Medusa artefact
2. RG-5 Grenades(x2) for a Quirk artefact
3. 5.45x39mm cartridges for a Droplet artefact
4. 7.62x39mm cartridges for a Stone Blood artefact
I've changed my mind...
I'll take the Shotgun Shells...
I'll take the Grenades...
I'll take the 5.45x39mm cartridges...
I'll take the 7.62x39mm cartridges...
I'll give you 3 packs of 12x70 buck for the Medusa...
Sounds good to me .. here you are...
I'll give you RG-5 Grenades(x2) for the Quirk...
Hand over the Grenades then...
Here's three packs of 5.45x39mm cartridges for the Droplet...
You've got yourself a deal...
Two packs of 7.62x39mm cartridges for the Stone Blood...
I can always use more bullets...
I don't have the right artefact, sorry...

Here's what I can offer:

1. TOZ-34 Shotgun for a Flash artefact
2. Saiga-12K for a Meat Chunk artefact
Give me the TOZ-34...
I'll take the Saiga-12k...
For the TOZ-34, I'll need a Flash artefact...
Yes, here you are then...
I'll swap the Saiga12k for a Meat Chunk...
Here you go .. one Meat Chunk artefact...

Here's what I can do:

1. First-Aid kits for a Stone Flower artefact
2. Vodka for a Quirk artefact
I can always use more First-Aid kits...
You can never have enough Vodka...
How does 8 First-Aid kits for a Stone Flower artefact sound?...
Sounds good to me .. hand'em over...
3 bottles of Vodka in exchange for a Quirk artefact...
You've got yourself a deal...

Here's the deal:

1. Armour Repair Kits in exchange for a Gravi artefact
2. Weapon Repair Kits in exchange for a Stone Flower artefact...
I'll take the Armour Repair Kits...
I'll need the Weapon Repair Kits...
Three 10% Armour Repair Kits for one Gravi...
Sounds good to me...
Three 10% Weapon Repair Kits for one Stone Flower
There can't be enough said about keeping your Weapons in check...
I would like to purchase some equipment...
The Main currency in the zone is artefacts!\nWhat exactly is necessary?
Ammunition, equipment...
Good Weapons ...
First-aid...
Repair sets...
Nothing for me today...
Cartridges for the AK-74 I will take...
I will take Grenades...
Cartridges 5.56 for NATO weapons I need...
Cartridges 9x39mm for the Vintorez and Groza I will take...
I Can give five packs simple or three packs armour-piercing for one Flash... Which do you want?
Five simple I will take...
Give the armour-piercing...
Three grenades RGD5 for a Stone Flower... You agree?
I need Grenades.
I Give five packs simple or three packs armour-piercing for one Slime...you agree?
Give the simple.
Armour-piercing I will take.
Five packs simple or four sniper or three armour-piercing for one Gravi... which do you want?
Give five simple.
Sniper I will take.
Armour-piercing - they bring quick death to the bloodsucker.
Do not have it, another time...

Here's my best weapons:\n1. The automatic Special Val (AS Val), is created on the basis of a silent Rifle Vintorez. Its one of the most deadly weapons in the zone. A bargain for two artefacts Fireball;\n2. Automatic-grenade launcher Complex OC-14 Groza - a variant of an assault rifle for close quarter combat: compact, reliable, and at the same time universal and powerful, for an artefact the Night star.
Val This is what I need...
Groza I've been looking for one of these!
For Val two Fireballs I take... you agree?
I agree, give me the Val...
Groza only in exchange for Night star... Agree?
I agree! Gimme!
For First-aid I offer:\n1. First-aid sets for an artefact Sparkler;\n2. Vodka which reduces radiation, for an artefact Stone Blood.
First-aid sets I will take...
I need the Vodka...
For five first-aid sets one Sparkler...
First-aid sets are not easy to find, so you've got a deal...
Five vodka in exchange for Stone Blood... You agree?
Yes I agree....
For repair I can offer:\n1. repair sets for armor for an artefact Meat Chunk;\n2. repair sets for weapons for an artefact Fireball.
For armor I will take.
I need The Weapon kits.
For three ten-percentage complete sets one Meat Chunk... you agree?
I agree...
Three ten-percentage weapon complete sets in exchange for Fireball... You agree?
Yes, I agree...
I need some equipment
If you have the Artefacts? Then I have the goods...\nWhat are you looking for?
Ammunition, equipment...
Good Weapons...
First-aid...
Repair sets...
I will take nothing...
I need Sniper cartridges.
I Will take the VOG grenades.
For the AK-47 give ammo...
Give me the armor....

The Bullet 7x13 has big enough (under sniper requirements) dispersion even on average distances, however, possesses the raised penetrative action.
7N1 (CENTRAL PROCESSING UNIT) - the regular sniper cartridge in 2-3 times exceeds 7N13 on dispersion indicators. However, does not possess high penetrative properties.
On a shooting grouping 7N14 it is equivalent to a sniper cartridge 7N1, however, considerably surpasses it in armour-piercing action, thanks to introduction in a design of a bullet of the pointed tempered steel core.
For one artefact of Droplet I give two packs of simple either sniper cartridges, or one pack of the armour-piercing... What you will choose?
Give simple, two packs...
Exact sniper cartridges are necessary To me...
I Will take armour-piercing, they are exact and lethal...
For one artefact Stone Blood I can offer four VOG-25 or three VOG-25p. Which will you take?
Give four twenty fifth...
Three, but more powerful...
Three packs of standard cartridges or two armour-piercing - a Medusa artefact ... Choose...
Standard, there is more of them...
Armour-piercing certainly...

OYAG-91D Universal protection! An excellent protective suit for the Zone. In structure: overalls OYAG-9D, system has a closed breathing cycle, a built in system of suppression of abnormal fields. Gives qualitative protection against bullet and fragmental hits. - Mica\nThe Duty Exoskeleton will manage in two artefacts!... I will trade for three Micas...
Well give Universal protection
Exo? Give, I will test...
You ask Too much...
I have sniper rifles:\n1. Sniper Vintora Dragunova (SVD) for an artefact Sea Urchin;\n2. A sniper Rifle Truncated Automatic Developing (SVU-AS) for the Soul artefact.
SVD though is heavy, but very accurate, I will take it...
The SVD expert is lighter, I will take it...
For SVD a the Sea Urchin I take... you agree?
Yes, I agree...
SVD expert only in exchange for Soul... You agree?
Yes, Soul not a rarity...
I have only military first-aid sets in stock...
What do you want for them?
For three first-aid sets one Stone Flower... you agree?
Yes I agree...
I don't have any Repair sets....
I can receive Equipment from you?
In general it is against rules, we don't usually offer this service, but considering your reputation.. What sort of equipment are you looking for?
Ammunition, equipment...
Advanced weapons...
First-aid...
Complete sets for weapon and armor repair...
I Have changed my mind, I will come back later...
Charges for the Gauss-rifle please
SuperGauss? Lets see what the fuss is all about...
Give me the overalls, I hope they are green?
Shot-gun shells I will take...
For one power capacity with ready lethal 9ìì elements in a clip 10 rounds we ask from you for one artefact the Night Star... Agree?
I agree!
For three power capacities of SuperGauss a Spring
Whatever it costs...

Certainly the green Overalls SSP-99M of Vega! Protection of a torso against bullet and fragmental damage. Effective protection against radiation and biological anomalies. Resistant to chemically-excited environments and other influences harmful to the organism!\nAnd we ask for it only one artefact Crystal.
Direct advertising, give!

We have cartridges for a shot-gun of three kinds and are ready to offer them to you for an artefact Sparkler:\nthe Usual cartridge of 12 gauge equipped with buckshot. Five packs!\ The Dart has a stabilised flight that positively affects accuracy. Three packs!\nThe heavy Slug - Zhekan. Two packs!
The Usual Buckshot suffices for the majority of monsters - I will take!
Exact Dart - that's what is necessary!
Lethal Slugs Zhekan - here's a medicine for mutants!
Do not have it, another time perhaps...
The weapons which we can offer you are:\n1. Smooth-bore shot-gun SPAS 12 for an artefact Slug;\n2. M72-M Gauss-rifle in exchange for 3 artefacts a Mother's Beads.
The Shot-gun Spas12? I will take that?
The Gauss-rifle! I dreamt for a long time of owning one!
Smooth-bore shot-gun SPAS 12 is distinguished by high reliability and flexibility. Perhaps, the best weapon for close combat in the Zone. And only one Slug does the job...
I agree! I will take the Spas12!

The Gauss-rifle - Works almost silently as ammunition is made from the energy of artefacts instead of gunpowder. Despite enormous capacity of shot, the recoil of a gauss-rifle is very insignificant. In accuracy and destructive power it surpasses all classical small arms. Fully penetrating any bullet-proof vest. We would like to receive for it three artefacts a Mother's Beads.
Three pieces?!! Rob me blind why don't you! I will Take it anyway...
For health we can recommend:\n1. First-aid sets scientific for an artefact Thorn;\n2. Anti-radiating preparations, for an artefact Slime.
First-aid sets scientific? How many? And are they good?
Antirad? That will help me save vodka...

The Medical set developed specially for work in the conditions of the Zone. The set structure is designed for both wounds and radiation sickness, and also reduces a dose of saved up radiation. For four sets only one Thorn... Agree?
Well if these first-aid sets are so good, I will take...
Antirad medication COMPLETELY reduces radiation. Five dose for one Slime. will you accept?
I accept.

In general we don't stock repair supplies, but someone by mistake has delivered two boxes with complete sets for armor repair... Therefore I with a clear conscience can offer you two repair sets for an artefact of Gravi
Only two sets? for such a valuable artefact!.
OK... For three complete sets one Gravi... Agree?
I agree...
So do you trade in any goods?
If you've got Artefacts then I've got the goods...What exactly do you need?
Cartridges, grenades, armor...
Good Weapons...
First-aid...
Accessories for repairs...
I don't need anything...
Give cartridges 5.56...
I need Grenades...
Cartridges for the PKM I will take...
Cartridges for the 5.7x39mm Belgian FN P90 I will take...
For one slime I can give five simple packs or three armour-piercing... Well?
Give five simple...
Armour-piercing is better...
Two grenades for a Thorn... You want?
I need Grenades.
Two boxes of cartridges - for an artefact the Crystal Prickle... You agree?
I agree...
Four packs of cartridges - Gravi... you agree?
I agree!...
Do not have it, another time perhaps...
I can offer:\n1. Belgian FN P90 for an artefact Goldfish;\n2. FN2000 - automatic with a 40mm grenade launcher with a sight-module, and fire control for three artefacts of Soul.
Give me the Belgian FN P90...
I've wanted for a long time to get my hands on a FN2000...
Where is the Goldfish?
Here, take away...
The cost is three Souls...
Here take these Souls...
While I can offer:\n1. First-aid sets for a Medusa artefact;\n2. Antirad for a Quirk artefact ..
First-aid sets I will take...
In the ZONE without Antirad you will not live...
For five first-aid sets one Medusa... agree?
Yes I agree...
Five Antirad in exchange for a Quirk... You accept?
Yes I accept....
While I can offer:\n1. Repair kits for weapons for an artefact Stone Flower.
For armor I will take.
Weapon repairs are more necessary.
For three ten-percentage complete sets one Gravi... agree?
I agree...
Three ten-percentage weapon complete sets in exchange for Stone Flower... You accept?
Yes, I accept...
Can you explain for me how I go about using these Repair Kits?..

To use the Kits : Simply drop the case on the ground in front of you .. then open it up, and use the Kits inside .. the Repairs to the Armour will be applied to the Armour being worn at present. In the case of Weapon Field Repair Kits .. the repairs will be applied to the weapon that is currently equipped. If something is too badly damaged, then repairs of any sort will NOT be possible, and you should receive a PDA message indicating so .. Quite simple, really...
And what is this toolbox for?

The toolbox is simply a carrying case for the Field Repair Kits I've put one set of Armour Repair Tools inside of it for you already .. try it out for yourself .. and, be careful not to lose this case out there, otherwise you won't be able to carry any Repair Kits at all...
I will make sure to keep it on me at all times!!
I need some equipment
You understand for trade only artefacts are accepted... What exactly is necessary?
Cartridges, grenades, a bullet-proof vest...
Good Weapons...
First-aid...
Repair sets...
I will buy nothing...
Sniper cartridges how many?
Vintorez cartridges I will take
Gauss, how many?
CKAT-10 armour, how much?

The Bullet 7x13 has big enough (under sniper requirements) dispersion even on average distances, however, possesses the raised penetrative action.
7N1 (CENTRAL PROCESSING UNIT) - the regular sniper cartridge in 2-3 times exceeds 7N13 on dispersion indicators. However, does not possess high penetrative properties.
On a shooting grouping 7N14 it is equivalent to a sniper cartridge 7N1, however, considerably surpasses it in armour-piercing action, thanks to introduction in a design of a bullet of the pointed tempered steel core.
For one artefact a Meat Chunk I give two packs of simple either sniper cartridges, or one pack of the armour-piercing... What you will choose?
Give simple, two packs...
Exact sniper cartridges are necessary...
I Will take armour-piercing, they are exact and lethal...
Five packs simple either four sniper or three armour-piercing for one Gravi... choose?
Give five simple.
Sniper I will take.
Armour-piercing - they bring down the bloodsucker.
One completely charged node for one artefact Fireball...
I agree, here's a Fireball
Three the Sea Urchin and the CKAT-10 is yours...
Here's 3 Sea Urchins...
Do not have it, another time perhaps...
I can offer a special Vintorez (BCC Vintorez) intended for silence and suppressed flash for sniper shooting, supplied with integrated muffler...
And what do you ask for it?
Saiga - that's quite something!.
Only one Crystal... agree?
I agree!!!
Saiga only in exchange for a Meat Chunk... Sound Good!?
Yes, a Meat Chunk is not a rarity...
I have only military first-aid sets.
And what you ask?
In the ZONE without vodka you will not live...
For three first-aid sets one the Crystal Prickle... agree?
I agree...
Five bottles in exchange for a Quirk... You Take?
I agree....
While I can offer:\n1. Repair kits for armor for an artefact Flash
And how many complete sets?
For Weapons are necessary.
For three ten-percentage complete sets one Flash... agree?
I agree...
Three ten-percentage weapon complete sets in exchange for a Stone Flower... You Take?
Yes, I will take....
Im looking for some equipment...
I can help, unfortunately artefacts are necessary... What did you want to find?
Cartridges...
Good Weapons...
First-aid...
Repair sets...
I will buy nothing...
Give shot-gun shells, how many you will give?...
I need Grenades...
Cartridges for NATO weapons I will take...
AK-47 cartridges...
For five packs of shot-gun shells a Thorn... agree?
Yes I agree...
Five grenades for one Slime... You accept?
I need Grenades.
Three packs of cartridges - Droplet artefact... You want?
I accept...
Three packs of cartridges - Flash... agree?
Yes, the stopping power is tremendous!...
Do not have it, another time perhaps...

While I can offer:\n1. Sniper SiG. This weapon was created for conducting fights in the urban conditions. To facilitate weight, some components have been machined or replaced, the weight has decreased almost twice, deterioration of the weapon - minimum. The weapon is supplied by an un-removable optical sight of the raised frequency rate... I Will trade for artefacts Mica;\n2. Old, kind, and reliable AK-47 for the Soul artefact.
And how many artefacts for the sniper SIG?
AK-47!!! give it to me!!!
Three Micas and the SIG is yours...
Here take these artefacts...
Soul that is?
Is available, have specially reserved...
While I can offer:\n1. First-aid sets for an artefact Slug;\n2. Antirad, for an artefact Stone Flower.
First-aid sets for what?
Antirad! how many?
Three Scientific sets for one Slug... agree?
I agree...
Five Antirad in exchange for one Stone Flower... You want?
I accept...
I have only Repair kits for weapons.
For armor I will take.
And what do you want for them?
For three ten-percentage complete sets one Gravi... agree?
I agree...
Three ten-percentage weapon complete sets in exchange for a the Crystal Prickle... You want?
Yes, I will take.
And who are you?
I'm in charge of provisions here. We need supplies badly, I can make it worth your while.
Do you have weapons and ammo? What kind of supplies do you need?

We don't need any money or artefacts. Those Duty bastards are trying to cut off our supplies and starve us out. And so far they have been doing a good job of it. What we need is food and fresh water. If you can get some beer and cigars that would be great also.
What kind of cartridges do you offer?
Do you have any good weapons?
What kind of medical supplies do you have?
Do you have any repair sets?

For cartridges:
1. Five Sandwich gets you one 5.45x39mm Cartridges
2. Two Bar of chocolate gets you one RGD-5 Grenade
3. Two 100*Rads gets you one 9x19mm +P+ Cartridges
4.Five Bread gets you one F1 Grenade
Nothing to trade today...
I will take the cartridges for the AK-74...
I need the RGD-5 Grenades...
I'll take the 9x19 armor piercing please...
I will take the F-1 grenade.
Give me the sandwich first and then you can have your cartridges.
Yes, here they are...
These are my favorite!
I'll see if I can get you some more.
Energy drinks are needed here...
Go On, have a drink...
This Bread better not be radioactive! Half the guys here have a bad case of the shits already from radioactive food!...
Give me the Grenades.
Don't have it, perhaps another time...
You want weapons? Well choose:\n1. The AN-94 'Abakan' will cost you 10 Canned Food\n2. The HK MP5 will cost you five Sausage
I need an Abakan...
MP-5, I will take one...
Hand over the Canned food...
Here you are, enjoy!...
There better not be maggots!!...
Its good, check for yourself...
This is what's available from our infirmary:\n1. Two Flask gets you one First-Aid Kit\n2. Five Sandwich gets you one Cossacks vodka
The First-aid set I will take...
Ill take the Vodka...
Finally, some fresh water.
There you are, drink up.
Five sandwiches for a bottle...
Vodka... you can never have enough, gimme...
Repair Kits:\n1. Three "Zone" Beer will get you one Armor Repair-Kit\n2. Three Cuban Cigar will get you one Weapon Repair-Kit
I,ll take the armor kit.
Weapon kits are what I need. Here, enjoy these Cuban cigars.
Where's the Beer at.
Here's three beers, enjoy!
Its been too long since I enjoyed one of these.
There not easy to get in the zone.
You Can sell equipment?
Yes I do, but not for cash. Bring vodka first, and the we can make a deal... Depends on the quantity of bottles you bring...\nWhat exactly do you want?
Cartridges, grenades, and also some armor...
An assault rifle or a machine gun?
Military med-kits are unique, I need some...
I don't need anything right now...
Cartridges for the AK-74 I will take...
Give me F-1 grenades, very powerful...
I will take the PKM rounds...
I will take the armor, only if its new...
I Can give five packs simple or three packs armour-piercing for three bottles... up to you?
Five Simple I will take...
Give me the armour-piercing...
Grenade F-1 = One vodka... You Want?
I need Grenades.
One box of 100 cartridges for seven bottles...
I agree...
The armor just came from the warehouse! Fifteen bottles!
Have you gone nuts! I really need it though, I accept...
Do not have enough, maybe another time...

I Can get:\n1. Abakan supplied with a 3h-fold optical sight for conducting sniper fire. The optics built in in the case possesses more zoom, than standard sights.;\n2. Machine gun PKM - tough and heavy, but is very powerful with hard hitting rounds and a 100 shot magazine capacity. Bring on the Chimeras!!!....
Abakan sniper? How many bottles?
For the PKM machine gun how much vodka is necessary?
The Gun is First class! Fifteen bottles I want... agree?
Its a deal, here's your vodka...
This is no small task, it is difficult to take out the PKM Machine gun without being seen... A case of vodka! 20 bottles! Well do you want it?
I agree! Give!
Yes the Military first-aid sets are a twice improved in comparison with the usual kits...
And how many will you give?
Two first-aid sets for a bottle...
I agree!
You spoke it is possible to approach you if I needed some gear?
Bring vodka and then I will help you out... By quantity of bottles...\nWhat exactly do you want?
Cartridges, grenades, and some good armor...
The assault rifle or a machine gun can be acquired?
Military-med kits are unique, can I get some...
Nothing for now...
Cartridges for the AK-74 I will take...
I need grenades.
AK-47 ammo will take...
The Sniper - the king of the Zone, give me some cartridges...
I Can give five packs simple or three packs armour-piercing for three bottles... up to you?
Simple five I will take...
Give me the armour-piercing...
Two grenades = One vodka... You Take?
I need Grenades.
Cartridges only armour-piercing - five bottles for three packs...
I agree...
A Pack of sniper cartridges - three bottles...
If that's what it costs...
Do not have it, another time perhaps...
I Can get:\n1. Abakan. A reliable, powerful weapon.;\n2. AK-47 it is a classic weapon, it is reliable and deadly...
Abakan? How many bottles you ask?
AK-47!!!! how much vodka?
Ten bottles I want... agree?
Certainly! Here's the vodka...
It is cheap... Eight bottles and it yours.
I agree! Give!
Approximately twice the strength compared to normal kits... Military men always protect their health...
And how many will you give?
Two first-aid sets for a bottle...
Agreed!
Stalker, we need to talk
It is possible I have a pair of offers that would be Favorable to both parties...
This is interesting I'm listening...
Do you Know where the documents are located on the third floor?

And that! We hardly sleep with this case in embrace... In any way an opportunity will not wait what to send all this shit to the center... On hearings there that that with Burner a brain is connected... Or with a way brains zombie...\nAnd you that what advantage of them?
There is an interest, time is asked...
Interest is? And in what you estimate this interest?
Well not in gold reserves in Russia... And there are variants?
Has got us here to sit... You of binge, neither women, nor entertainments... I to you so will tell - for good binge all can be got... got it?
Well very good binge I do not promise, but vodka it is possible to adjust... Not of burning...
Appears so... A box of vodka - and the case is yours... That's a bargain yes?
A bargain! there Will be a box of vodka for you!
Eh of the fighter! The native land for vodka will sell... Itself I will extract...
\nEnsign Sherstjuk for twenty bottles of vodka agrees to bring a case with documents...
Borov has sent me to survey the site of a helicopter crash which is located behind a bog, just south of the lab, in the Dark Valley. All that is valuable - we must drag to Borov...

\nThe Bandit known by the nickname 'Rat' has written down many secrets in his PDA. Borov wants the return of this PDA. In any way. A mark in a map where the Rat disappeared, it is possible that the Senior Lecturer from the 100*Rads bar Can pinpoint his location.
Hello, the Vodka has arrived!
Ah, your a good fellow! Let's take a look...
Have you brought the documents?
The Word of a military man is not to be doubted! Here are your documents!
Here's your vodka...
Hold this suitcase, do not strain yourself now...
Trader's Offers

Vein's Offers:

Ammunition:
1. Five Sandwhich gets you one 5.45x39mm Cartridges
2. Two Bar of chocolate gets you one RGD-5 Grenade
3. Two 100*Rads gets you one 9x19mm +P+ Cartridges
4.Five Bread gets you one F1 Grenade

Weapons? Well choose:
1. The AN-94 'Abakan' will cost you 10 Canned Food
2. The HK MP5 will cost you five Sausage

Medical Supplies:
1. Two Flask gets you one First-Aid Kit
2. Five Sandwiches gets you one Cossacks vodka

Repair Kits:
1. Three "Zone" Beer will get you one Armor Repair-Kit
2. Three Cuban Cigar will get you one Weapon Repair-Kit
Can you provide me with another Toolbox?
Did you go, and lose yours or something?!
Just answer the question...
Yeah, I can provide you with another one .. but ..
But, what?...
But, it will cost you 10 Medusa artefacts...
OK, fine .. it's not like I have a choice .. here you go...
That's a bit steep, don't you think?!
That's what I like about you, Marked One .. you never complain...
You drive a hard bargain... OK, fine, make it Seven then...
You want to make something of it?! .. Go ahead!!
I'll be back for it when I have the Artefacts...
